data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 41,252,200 souls living in the state of São Paulo with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of São Paulo, Brazil

data.prayer: There are 41,252,200 people living in the state of São Paulo. Only about 10,287,968 might be believers.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of São Paulo to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 10,287,968 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jew, Portuguese-speaking people.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in São Paulo, Brazil to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of São Paulo access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.section_summary:
the state of São Paulo, Brazil has a population of 41,252,200.

We estimate São Paulo has 10,287,968 people who might know Jesus, 26,748,381 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,215,851 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, 41,252,200 people live in the state of São Paulo. Please, give them 8,250 new simple churches this year.
